titleStmt.title: A heavenly visitation to the travelling soul and generation born again of the immortal seed With a testimony of the regenerate and true birth thereunto.
titleStmt.author: Watson, Samuel, ca. 1618-1708.

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed at end: York Castle the 27th of 5th month 1685. Samuel Watson.
Place of publication suggested by cataloger; Wing gives [London].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
